oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General William Tecumseh Sherman
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Head and shoulders studio carte de visite of William T. Sherman. Bears facsimile signature. Page is marked 112, but it is out of order. Upper left corner.

Union general William T. Sherman was appointed commander of the Western Theater in 1864. He commanded troops at the Battles of First Bull Run, Shiloh, Vicksburg, and Chattanooga. He is best remembered for his practice of total war and his
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carte de visite; Sherman, William T. (William Tecumseh), 1820-1891; United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Portraits
